title: Upgrade Defect & Requirement Management: Structured Models & Integration
description: Enhance the current free-text 'Bug ID' and 'Requirement ID' fields into structured data models (Defect, Requirement) to enable rich integration with external tools (Jira, GitHub Issues) and better traceability.
verification_steps: Verify Prisma schema has Defect and Requirement models.
Verify GET /api/testcases returns defects and requirements.
